title: President Rajapaksa arrives in New York to attend UN General Assembly
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa arrived in New York, USA on Monday 19 September to attend the 66th session of the United Nations General Assembly. The President led the delegation which also includes External Affairs Minister Prof. G.L. Peiris, to the UN Summit….
